static method calculateColumnWidth [line 47]

	

    

    

		static int calculateColumnWidth(
[int
$fontSize = 9], [bool
$fontSizeInPixels = false], [string
$columnText = ''], [int
$rotation = 0])
    

    


	
		

Calculate an (approximate) OpenXML column width, based on font size and text contained





Tags:





  

    return:  Column width
  

  

    access:  public
  









	
        
Parameters:

    

    

          

        int  
        $fontSize  
        Font size (in pixels or points)
      

          

        bool  
        $fontSizeInPixels  
        Is the font size specified in pixels (true) or in points (false) ?
      

          

        string  
        $columnText  
        Text to calculate width
      

          

        int  
        $rotation  
        Rotation angle
